name: The Lovers
description:
The Lovers is a puzzle game where players interact with animated sketches and narrative challenges inside of a journal storybook in order to break curses cast upon two enamored souls.

The Gods of Love have been cursed by their fellow deities, doomed to forget their devotion. If their curses are not soon broken, all love will vanish from the world. You must embark on a quest to solve various puzzles to break these curses and save Love. 

Journey through a story of a pantheon of Gods, all rulers over a single emotion, and solve each individual God's curse with strategy and careful examination of the game's narrative poetry. The Lovers offers unique puzzle mechanics that will challenge and immerse you, along with breathtaking hand-drawn art that comes alive at your touch. 

Save Love today!
